thread.section_title: ScreenPrinting.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ScreenPrinting.com | screenprinting.com
thread.title: Damian Lefave

author: Damian Lefave
title: Damian Lefave
text: I started a screenprinting company from scratch. Ordered everything through screenprinting.com. Everything I ordered was delivered on time. Anything that needed it was carefully packaged to prevent damage. I called customer service more than a few times to ask questions and get opinions on products and was everytime pleased with the service. I will order everything from screenprinting.com in the future and would reccomend them to anyone.
